## Load early votes data
This data is as of Day 4, Sunday, Oct. 27. Early voting in Maryland is between Oct. 24 to Oct. 31.
```{r}
# Load the Maryland expenditures data table
earlyvoting_raw_data <- read_csv("GitHub/cns/early_votes_story/EarlyVoting RAW data.csv")
View(earlyvoting_raw_data)
```
